text: Pleasant Grove Township is a township in the County of Des Moines in Iowa. The population was 442 in 2020, with 213 males and 229 females. == Important places in Pleasant Grove == === Churches === *Cedar Grove Church *Shaver Church *Agape Fellowship Church === Cemeteries === *Wilcox Cemetery *Infant Cemetery === Reservoirs === *Sixmile Creek Watershed Site Three Reservoir *Sixmile Creek Watershed Site Two Reservoir *Watson Lake === Creeks === *Shaver Creek *Caney Creek *Little Creek == References == Category:Settlements in Iowa Category:Townships in the United States
title: Pleasant Grove Township, Des Moines County, Iowa
